This folder contains custom agents for the workspace.

Usage:
- Open the chat view in VS Code and pick the appropriate agent from the Agents dropdown.
- For background agents, choose the Git worktree option to isolate changes from your main workspace.
- Attach files, errors, or search results in chat to provide contextual prompts.

Agents in this repository:
- Reconstructor Agent: Run and debug training/evaluation tasks.
- Experiment Planner: Design hyperparameter sweeps and reproducible runs.
